label: HubSpot Users API
description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Hubspot Users API

tools.name: CreateHubspotUser
tools.description:
Create a new user in HubSpot with basic permissions.

This tool creates a new user in HubSpot with minimal permissions (contacts-base). The user will receive a welcome email to set a password and log in.

parameters.name: user_email
parameters.description: The email address of the user to be created in HubSpot.

parameters.name: additional_team_ids
parameters.description: List of IDs representing the user's additional teams.

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: The last name of the user to be created in HubSpot.

parameters.name: primary_team_id
parameters.description: The identifier for the user's primary team in HubSpot.

parameters.name: send_welcome_email
parameters.description: Set to true to send a welcome email prompting the user to set a password and log in.

parameters.name: user_first_name
parameters.description: The first name of the user to be created in HubSpot.

parameters.name: user_role_id
parameters.description: A string representing the new user's role within HubSpot.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: FetchHubspotUsersList
tools.description:
Retrieve a list of users from a HubSpot account.

Use this tool to get a list of users associated with a specific HubSpot account. It is useful for managing or viewing user information within the account.

parameters.name: page_cursor_after
parameters.description: A string token used to retrieve the next page of users, if more than 100 users are available.

parameters.name: user_retrieval_limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of users to retrieve from the HubSpot account.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: GetAccountRoles
tools.description:
Retrieve all user roles from an account.

This tool is called to fetch and list all the roles available on a specific account from Hubspot.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: RemoveUserHubspot
tools.description:
Remove a user from HubSpot using their ID or email.

This tool removes a user from HubSpot, identified by either their user ID or email. It should be called when a user needs to be permanently deleted or archived from the HubSpot system.

parameters.name: user_identifier
parameters.description: Identifier of the user to remove from HubSpot. It can be a user ID or an email address.

parameters.name: user_identifier_property
parameters.description: Specify whether to use `USER_ID` or `EMAIL` to identify the user.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: RetrieveHubspotUserById
tools.description:
Retrieve Hubspot user details using user ID or email.

Call this tool to retrieve detailed information about a Hubspot user identified by their user ID or optionally by email.

parameters.name: user_identifier
parameters.description: Identifier of the Hubspot user to retrieve. It can be the user ID or email based on the `id_property`.

parameters.name: user_identifier_property
parameters.description: Specifies the property to identify the user: `USER_ID` (default) or `EMAIL`.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: UpdateHubspotUserInfo
tools.description:
Update information for a specified Hubspot user.

This tool modifies the information of a Hubspot user identified by `userId`. It can be called when you need to update user data using their ID or email.

parameters.name: user_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the user. Can be the user's ID or email, based on the `id_property`.

parameters.name: additional_teams_ids
parameters.description: An array of strings representing the IDs of the user's additional teams.

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: The first name of the user to update. This should be a string value.

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: The last name of the user to be modified. This is the new value of the user's last name.

parameters.name: user_identifier_property
parameters.description: Specifies if the user is identified by 'USER_ID' or 'EMAIL'. Default is 'USER_ID'.

parameters.name: user_primary_team_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the user's primary team.

parameters.name: user_role_id
parameters.description: The ID representing the user's role. Used to assign the user a specific role within the system.

codeExample.tabLabel: Call the Tool with User Authorization

tools.name: ViewAccountTeams
tools.description:
Retrieve all teams for the account.

Call this tool to view all teams associated with a specific account in Hubspot. Useful for managing or reviewing team structures.

summary:
Arcade's HubspotUsersApi toolkit allows developers to interact seamlessly with the HubSpot Users API, enabling efficient management of user data and roles within HubSpot accounts.

**Capabilities**  
- Create, retrieve, update, and remove users in HubSpot.  
- Fetch user roles and teams associated with specific accounts.  
- Manage user permissions effectively through targeted API calls.

**OAuth**  
- This toolkit utilizes OAuth2 for authentication, requiring the following scopes: crm.objects.users.read, crm.objects.users.write, settings.users.read, settings.users.teams.read, settings.users.write.
